leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 生信-宏基因组与微生物生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 组装→分箱→分类→功能注释→统计→benchmark

tools.name: BASALT
tools.one_line_profile: Binning and refinement toolkit for short- and long-read metagenomic sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: BASALT (Binning Across a Series of Assemblies Toolkit) is a pipeline designed for the binning and refinement of metagenomic data derived from both short and long sequencing reads. It integrates multiple assembly and binning strategies to improve the recovery of high-quality metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs).

tools.name: MetaMDBG
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight assembler for long and accurate metagenomics reads
tools.detailed_description: MetaMDBG is a de novo assembler specifically designed for long and accurate metagenomic reads (e.g., PacBio HiFi). It uses a multi-k de Bruijn graph approach to efficiently assemble complex metagenomic communities with low memory usage.

tools.name: Geo-omics scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of metagenomic pipelines and general scripts
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing various scripts and pipelines for metagenomic analysis, including processing and assembly tasks used in the Geo-omics lab context.

tools.name: haploMAGIC
tools.one_line_profile: Phasing and haplotype reconstruction tool for multiparental populations
tools.detailed_description: haploMAGIC is a tool for phasing, haplotype reconstruction, and crossover detection using single-nucleotide polymorphism (SNP) data, specifically tailored for multiparental populations.

tools.name: MegaGTA
tools.one_line_profile: HMM-guided metagenomic gene-targeted assembler
tools.detailed_description: MegaGTA is a gene-targeted assembler for metagenomic data that utilizes Hidden Markov Models (HMMs) and iterative de Bruijn graphs to reconstruct specific gene sequences from complex metagenomic samples.

tools.name: HINGE
tools.one_line_profile: Long-read assembler optimized for repeat resolution
tools.detailed_description: HINGE is a de novo assembler for long-read sequencing data that focuses on optimal repeat resolution by distinguishing between repeats that can be bridged by reads and those that cannot.

tools.name: Iterative-Hybrid-Assembly
tools.one_line_profile: Unicycler-based iterative hybrid assembly pipeline for MAG reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed to reconstruct high-quality Metagenome-Assembled Genomes (MAGs) from enrichment systems using an iterative hybrid assembly approach based on Unicycler.

tools.name: viGEN
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for viral RNA exploration in human NGS data
tools.detailed_description: viGEN is a bioinformatics pipeline designed to detect and explore viral RNA sequences within human Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) data, facilitating viral metagenomics studies.

tools.name: PHap
tools.one_line_profile: Haplotype-resolved assembly pipeline for autopolyploids
tools.detailed_description: PHap is a genome assembly pipeline tailored for autopolyploids that produces haplotype-resolved and telomere-to-telomere assemblies using long-read and Hi-C sequencing data.

tools.name: Autometa
tools.one_line_profile: Automated extraction of genomes from shotgun metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: Autometa is a tool for the automated binning and extraction of microbial genomes from shotgun metagenomic datasets, utilizing coverage and sequence composition information.

tools.name: MeGAMerge
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to merge assembled contigs and long reads
tools.detailed_description: MeGAMerge is a tool designed to merge assembled contigs and long reads from metagenomic sequencing runs, improving assembly continuity.

tools.name: ont-assembly-snake
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for bacterial genome assembly and polishing
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow for assembling and polishing bacterial genomes using Oxford Nanopore Technologies (ONT) sequencing data, integrating multiple assembly and polishing tools.

tools.name: HyLight
tools.one_line_profile: Strain-aware de novo assembly method for metagenomics
tools.detailed_description: HyLight is a hybrid assembly method based on the overlap-layout-consensus (OLC) paradigm that leverages both NGS and third-generation sequencing data to assemble complex metagenomic data with strain awareness.

tools.name: CAT/BAT/RAT (dev)
tools.one_line_profile: Taxonomic classification of contigs and MAGs
tools.detailed_description: Development version of CAT/BAT/RAT, a suite of tools for the taxonomic classification of contigs and Metagenome-Assembled Genomes (MAGs), as well as taxonomic profiling of metagenomes.

tools.name: CAT/BAT/RAT
tools.one_line_profile: Taxonomic classification of contigs and MAGs
tools.detailed_description: CAT (Contig Annotation Tool) and BAT (Bin Annotation Tool) are pipelines for the taxonomic classification of long DNA sequences and metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs).

tools.name: Wochenende
tools.one_line_profile: Whole genome/metagenome sequencing alignment pipeline
tools.detailed_description: Wochenende is a pipeline for the alignment, filtering, and visualization of whole genome and metagenome sequencing data, aiding in the detection and analysis of species in complex samples.

tools.name: nf_wochenende
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow version of the Wochenende metagenome pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow implementation of the Wochenende pipeline for reference-based metagenome binning, alignment, and visualization.

tools.name: Inspector
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for evaluating long-read de novo assembly results
tools.detailed_description: Inspector is a tool designed to evaluate the quality of de novo assemblies generated from long-read sequencing data, identifying assembly errors and assessing continuity.

tools.name: copycat
tools.one_line_profile: Script to bin read coverage across a genome
tools.detailed_description: Copycat captures and bins read coverage across a genome from a BAM file, outputting coverage information suitable for copy number variation analysis and visualization.

tools.name: DAmar
tools.one_line_profile: Long read QC, assembly and scaffolding pipeline
tools.detailed_description: DAmar is a pipeline for processing long-read sequencing data, performing quality control, de novo assembly, and scaffolding.

tools.name: ViPER
tools.one_line_profile: Viral metagenomics pipeline for trimming, assembly, and classification
tools.detailed_description: ViPER is a bioinformatics pipeline for viral metagenomics that handles read trimming, de novo assembly, and taxonomic classification of the resulting contigs.

tools.name: MetaSUB_CAP
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive pipeline for short read metagenomic data
tools.detailed_description: MetaSUB_CAP is a comprehensive analysis pipeline designed for processing short-read metagenomic data, developed by the MetaSUB consortium.

tools.name: NovoGraph
tools.one_line_profile: Building whole genome graphs from long-read assemblies
tools.detailed_description: NovoGraph is a tool for constructing whole genome graphs from de novo assemblies generated from long-read sequencing data, facilitating the analysis of structural variations and genome complexity.

tools.name: ViruSpy
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for viral identification from metagenomic samples
tools.detailed_description: ViruSpy is a pipeline designed to identify viral sequences within metagenomic samples, aiding in viral ecology and pathogen detection studies.

tools.name: de-novo-transcriptome-assembly-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Combined de novo transcriptome assembly pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for de novo transcriptome assembly that combines results from multiple assemblers and parameters to improve assembly quality.

tools.name: NextDenovo
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and accurate de novo assembler for long reads
tools.detailed_description: NextDenovo is a string graph-based de novo assembler designed for long-read sequencing data (PacBio/Nanopore), optimized for speed and accuracy in assembling large genomes.

tools.name: NextPolish
tools.one_line_profile: Genome polishing tool for long reads
tools.detailed_description: NextPolish is a tool for polishing genome assemblies using long reads (and optionally short reads) to correct base errors and improve assembly quality.

tools.name: NextPolish2
tools.one_line_profile: Repeat-aware polishing for HiFi long read assemblies
tools.detailed_description: NextPolish2 is the successor to NextPolish, specifically designed for repeat-aware polishing of genomes assembled using PacBio HiFi long reads.

tools.name: Mapler
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenome assembly and evaluation pipeline for long reads
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed for metagenome assembly and evaluation, specifically optimized for HiFi long reads but also supporting LoFi long reads and hybrid assembly strategies.

tools.name: DataQualityDashboard
tools.one_line_profile: Data quality assessment tool for observational health data
tools.detailed_description: A tool developed by the OHDSI community to characterize and assess the quality of observational health data by applying a set of data quality checks and generating a transparent report.

tools.name: Corset
tools.one_line_profile: Clustering tool for de novo assembled transcripts
tools.detailed_description: Software for clustering de novo assembled transcripts and counting overlapping reads, useful for transcriptomics analysis where a reference genome is not available.

tools.name: EasyNanoMeta
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for nanopore long-read metagenomic analysis
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline specifically designed for the analysis of metagenomic data generated by Nanopore long-read sequencing technologies.

tools.name: pb-metagenomics-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for PacBio HiFi metagenomics analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools and pipelines tailored for processing and analyzing PacBio HiFi reads in metagenomics studies, including assembly and taxonomic profiling.

tools.name: CoCoNet
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised binning tool for viral metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based tool for unsupervised binning of contigs from viral metagenomes, facilitating the reconstruction of viral genomes from mixed samples.

tools.name: phamb
tools.one_line_profile: Post-processing tool for VAMB viral binning
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed for the downstream processing of bins generated by VAMB, specifically focused on viral elucidation and refinement of viral bins.

tools.name: vamb
tools.one_line_profile: Variational autoencoder for metagenomic binning
tools.detailed_description: A metagenomic binning tool that uses a variational autoencoder to encode sequence information and cluster contigs into bins, suitable for large-scale datasets.

tools.name: Eukfinder
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for retrieving microbial eukaryote genomes
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline designed to retrieve and assemble microbial eukaryote genomes from metagenomic sequencing data.

tools.name: Hairsplitter
tools.one_line_profile: Assembly refinement tool for separating collapsed sequences
tools.detailed_description: Software that separates very close sequences (e.g., strains or haplotypes) that have been collapsed during assembly, utilizing long-read data.

tools.name: Path-Flyer
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for quadrotor path following algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking tool for evaluating and comparing different quadrotor path following algorithms, useful for robotics and control systems research.

tools.name: PhasedDiploidGenomeAssemblyPipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for reference-free diploid genome assembly
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline that combines de-novo assembly and read-phasing techniques to assemble diploid genomes without requiring a reference genome.

tools.name: Magni
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for AFM image reconstruction and compressed sensing
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for Atomic Force Microscopy (AFM) image reconstruction and general compressed sensing applications, supporting scientific imaging research.

tools.name: reticulatus
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for assembling and polishing long genomes
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake-based pipeline designed for assembling and polishing long genomes using long nanopore sequencing reads.

tools.name: cFMD
tools.one_line_profile: Curated Food Metagenomic Data repository and access
tools.detailed_description: A repository and associated resources for accessing the curatedFoodMetagenomicData (cFMD) dataset, facilitating analysis of food-associated microbiomes.

tools.name: mmlong2
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for MAG recovery and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline for the recovery and analysis of metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs), integrating various assembly and binning steps.

tools.name: mmlong2-lite
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight pipeline for microbial genome recovery
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight version of the mmlong2 pipeline, optimized for microbial genome recovery from metagenomic data.

tools.name: XFEM_Fracture2D
tools.one_line_profile: 2D fracture mechanics solver using XFEM
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB program for solving fracture problems involving arbitrary multiple crack propagations in 2D linear-elastic solids using the Extended Finite Element Method (XFEM).

tools.name: Vamba
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid Mamba-Transformer model for long video understanding
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Vamba model, a hybrid architecture combining Mamba and Transformers for understanding hour-long videos, presented at ICCV 2025.

tools.name: HMSSS
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for identifying sulfur metabolism-related genes
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the identification of sulfur metabolism-related genes and analysis of operon structures in genome and metagenome assemblies.

tools.name: ILRA
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for improvement of long read assemblies
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed to assist in the post-assembly process (finishing) by cleaning and merging contigs, correcting homopolymer tracks, and circulating plastids.

tools.name: TSSKit
tools.one_line_profile: Threshold Signature Scheme Toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit implementing Threshold Signature Schemes (TSS), useful for cryptographic research and secure multi-party computation.

tools.name: KOunt
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for calculating KEGG orthologue abundance
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake pipeline for calculating the abundance of KEGG orthologues in metagenomic sequence data, aiding in functional profiling.

tools.name: TIPP
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for telomere assembly and genome polishing
tools.detailed_description: A set of tools for telomere local assembly, improved whole genome polishing, and plastid assembly, enhancing genome assembly quality.

tools.name: METAMVGL
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-view graph-based metagenomic contig binning algorithm
tools.detailed_description: A binning algorithm that integrates assembly graphs and paired-end graphs using a multi-view graph-based approach to improve metagenomic contig binning.

tools.name: VNom
tools.one_line_profile: Reference-free tool for nominating viroid-like contigs
tools.detailed_description: A tool for identifying viroid-like contigs from de novo assembled data without relying on reference sequences, useful for viroid discovery.

tools.name: dentist
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for closing assembly gaps using long reads
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to close gaps in genome assemblies with high accuracy by utilizing long-read sequencing data.

tools.name: graphamr
tools.one_line_profile: Antibiotic resistance prediction from assembly graphs
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for predicting antibiotic resistance genes directly from metagenome assembly graphs, enabling AMR detection in complex metagenomic data.

tools.name: metaGT
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for metagenome and metatranscriptome joint assembly
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline designed for the joint assembly of metagenomic and metatranscriptomic data to improve assembly quality and transcript recovery.

tools.name: StringDecomposer
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for decomposition of centromeric assemblies and long reads into monomers
tools.detailed_description: An algorithm for decomposing long reads or assemblies of centromeric regions into a sequence of monomers, useful for analyzing repetitive genomic structures.

tools.name: YAMP
tools.one_line_profile: Yet Another Metagenomic Pipeline for QC and characterization
tools.detailed_description: A containerized Nextflow pipeline for processing metagenomic data, including quality control, decontamination, and taxonomic/functional profiling.

tools.name: VirSearch
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow to detect and classify viruses in metagenome assemblies
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow designed to identify and classify viral sequences within metagenomic assemblies using various viral detection tools.

tools.name: nxf-kraken2
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for running Kraken2 and Bracken
tools.detailed_description: A streamlined Nextflow pipeline for taxonomic classification and abundance estimation using Kraken2 and Bracken in Docker containers.

tools.name: MAGPurify2
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to identify and remove contaminants from metagenome-assembled genomes
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to improve the quality of Metagenome-Assembled Genomes (MAGs) by detecting and removing contamination based on genomic features.

tools.name: SOAPdenovo-Trans
tools.one_line_profile: De novo transcriptome assembler designed for RNA-Seq
tools.detailed_description: A de novo transcriptome assembler specifically designed for RNA-Seq data, capable of handling alternative splicing and variable expression levels.

tools.name: SOAPdenovo2
tools.one_line_profile: Short-read de novo genome assembler
tools.detailed_description: A widely used de novo genome assembler for short-read sequencing data, optimized for large genomes and high memory efficiency.

tools.name: T2T-Polish
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation and polishing workflows for T2T genome assemblies
tools.detailed_description: A collection of workflows used for polishing and evaluating Telomere-to-Telomere (T2T) genome assemblies, ensuring high base-level accuracy.

tools.name: Chloroplast-genome-assembly
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for assembling chloroplast genomes using short/long reads
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed to facilitate the de novo assembly of chloroplast genomes from NGS short reads or long read data.

tools.name: assembleBAC-ONT
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for de novo assembly and annotation of bacterial genomes from ONT data
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline that performs de novo assembly and annotation of bacterial genomes using Oxford Nanopore (ONT) long-read sequencing data.

tools.name: LongStitch
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to correct and scaffold assemblies using long reads
tools.detailed_description: A scalable pipeline that corrects and scaffolds genome assemblies using long-read sequencing data (e.g., Nanopore) to improve contiguity.

tools.name: RNA-Bloom
tools.one_line_profile: Reference-free transcriptome assembly for short and long reads
tools.detailed_description: A de novo transcriptome assembler that leverages bloom filters to assemble transcripts from short or long read RNA-seq data without a reference genome.

tools.name: ARCS
tools.one_line_profile: Scaffold genome sequence assemblies using linked or long read sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for scaffolding genome assemblies using 10x Genomics linked reads or other long-range sequencing information.

tools.name: GoldRush
tools.one_line_profile: Linear-time de novo Long Read Assembler
tools.detailed_description: A de novo assembler for long-read sequencing data designed to operate with linear time complexity relative to genome size.

tools.name: ntEdit
tools.one_line_profile: Genome assembly polishing and SNV detection
tools.detailed_description: A scalable genomics application for polishing genome assemblies and detecting single nucleotide variations (SNVs) using Bloom filters.

tools.name: ntLink
tools.one_line_profile: Minimizer-based assembly scaffolding and mapping using long reads
tools.detailed_description: A tool that uses minimizers to map long reads and scaffold genome assemblies, offering a lightweight alternative to alignment-based scaffolding.

tools.name: Arete
tools.one_line_profile: AMR/VF LGT focused bacterial genomics analysis workflow
tools.detailed_description: A workflow for analyzing bacterial genomes with a focus on Antimicrobial Resistance (AMR), Virulence Factors (VF), and Lateral Gene Transfer (LGT).

tools.name: Mitogenome_assembler
tools.one_line_profile: Assembler for plant mitochondrial genomes
tools.detailed_description: A specialized tool developed for the de novo assembly of complex plant mitochondrial genomes.

tools.name: ShortBRED
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline to identify and quantify protein families in metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline that creates unique markers for protein families and searches for them in metagenomic data to determine presence and abundance.

tools.name: metagenome_assembly
tools.one_line_profile: WDL Workflow for metagenome assembly
tools.detailed_description: A WDL-based workflow for performing metagenome assembly, likely designed for cloud or cluster execution.

tools.name: MetaWRAP
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible pipeline for genome-resolved metagenomic data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline that integrates various metagenomic tools for assembly, binning, and bin refinement to produce high-quality MAGs.

tools.name: bin3C
tools.one_line_profile: Extract metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs) using Hi-C
tools.detailed_description: A tool that utilizes Hi-C chromatin conformation capture data to cluster contigs and extract metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs) from metagenomic samples.

tools.name: GraffiTE
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline to find and genotype polymorphic transposable elements
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for detecting polymorphic transposable elements in genome assemblies and genotyping them using graph-based methods.

tools.name: SURPI+
tools.one_line_profile: Rapid computational pipeline for pathogen identification from clinical metagenomic data
tools.detailed_description: SURPI+ is a comprehensive pipeline designed for the identification of pathogens in clinical metagenomic sequence data, facilitating rapid diagnosis and analysis.

tools.name: CheckM2
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning-based tool for assessing the quality of metagenome-derived genome bins
tools.detailed_description: CheckM2 uses a gradient boost machine learning model to predict the completeness and contamination of metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs) without relying on lineage-specific marker sets.

tools.name: C-CONCOCT
tools.one_line_profile: Optimized C implementation of Gaussian Mixture Models for the CONCOCT binning tool
tools.detailed_description: A multithreaded C implementation designed to accelerate the clustering stage of the CONCOCT metagenomic binning tool, applicable to general GMM clustering tasks.

tools.name: EukMetaSanity
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for structural and functional annotation of eukaryotic MAGs
tools.detailed_description: EukMetaSanity automates the annotation of eukaryotic genomes recovered from metagenomes, integrating gene prediction and functional annotation tools.

tools.name: MitoGeneExtractor
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to extract protein-coding mitochondrial genes from sequencing libraries
tools.detailed_description: MitoGeneExtractor identifies and extracts mitochondrial genes (e.g., COI) from short and long read sequencing data, useful for phylogenetic and biodiversity studies.

tools.name: CompareM2
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for comparative analysis of microbial genomes
tools.detailed_description: CompareM2 provides a workflow for calculating comparative statistics (like AAI/ANI) and generating reports for microbial genomes and metagenome-assembled genomes.

tools.name: DAS Tool
tools.one_line_profile: Binning refinement tool integrating results from multiple binners
tools.detailed_description: DAS Tool (Dereplication, Aggregation and Scoring Tool) is an automated method that integrates the results of multiple binning algorithms to calculate an optimized, non-redundant set of bins.

tools.name: EsViritu
tools.one_line_profile: Read mapping pipeline for viral pathogen detection
tools.detailed_description: EsViritu is a pipeline designed for the detection and measurement of viral pathogens in metagenomic or clinical data via read mapping.

tools.name: MetaSBT
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable framework for indexing microbial genomes using Sequence Bloom Trees
tools.detailed_description: MetaSBT allows for the automatic indexing of microbial genomes and accurate characterization of metagenome-assembled genomes using Sequence Bloom Trees (SBTs).

tools.name: viroprofiler
tools.one_line_profile: Containerized bioinformatics pipeline for viral metagenomic data analysis
tools.detailed_description: Viroprofiler is a pipeline for analyzing viral metagenomic data, including quality control, assembly, identification, and annotation of viral sequences.

tools.name: RefineM
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for improving metagenome-assembled genomes
tools.detailed_description: RefineM provides a set of tools to identify and remove contamination from metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs) based on genomic properties like GC content and coverage.

tools.name: HiCBin
tools.one_line_profile: Binning metagenomic contigs using Hi-C contact maps
tools.detailed_description: HiCBin utilizes Hi-C contact information to cluster metagenomic contigs and recover high-quality metagenome-assembled genomes.

tools.name: Oases
tools.one_line_profile: De novo transcriptome assembler for short reads
tools.detailed_description: Oases is a de novo transcriptome assembler designed to produce transcripts from short read sequencing data, working in conjunction with the Velvet assembler.

tools.name: Velvet
tools.one_line_profile: Short read de novo assembler using de Bruijn graphs
tools.detailed_description: Velvet is a classic de novo genomic assembler specially designed for short read sequencing technologies, utilizing de Bruijn graphs for assembly.

tools.name: ARGfams
tools.one_line_profile: Identification of antibiotic resistance genes using HMM profiles
tools.detailed_description: ARGfams facilitates the fast and robust identification of antibiotic resistance genes (ARGs) from microbial genomes and metagenomes using a curated database of profile HMMs.

tools.name: MGEfams
tools.one_line_profile: Identification of mobile genetic elements using HMM profiles
tools.detailed_description: MGEfams is a tool for identifying mobile genetic elements (MGEs) in genomes and metagenomes using a manually curated database of profile Hidden Markov Models.

tools.name: trio_binning
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of the trio-binning genome assembly method
tools.detailed_description: Programs implementing the trio-binning strategy for assembling haplotype-resolved genomes using parental short reads to bin offspring long reads.

tools.name: hAMRoaster
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for comparing AMR gene detection tools
tools.detailed_description: hAMRoaster is an analysis pipeline designed to benchmark and compare the performance of various tools used for detecting antimicrobial resistance (AMR) genes.

tools.name: SALA
tools.one_line_profile: Transcript Start-site Aware Long-read Assembler
tools.detailed_description: SALA is a de novo assembler for long-read transcriptomics that utilizes transcription start site information to improve transcript and gene model assembly.

tools.name: strainFlye
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for analyzing rare mutations in metagenome-assembled genomes
tools.detailed_description: strainFlye is a pipeline for performing strain-level analysis on metagenomes, specifically focusing on calling and analyzing rare mutations within MAGs.

tools.name: MpGAP
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-platform genome assembly pipeline
tools.detailed_description: MpGAP is a comprehensive pipeline for genome assembly that supports data from Illumina, Nanopore, and PacBio sequencing platforms.

tools.name: SuperPang
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for generating non-redundant pangenome assemblies
tools.detailed_description: SuperPang creates non-redundant pangenome assemblies by integrating sequences from multiple genomes or bins, useful for pangenomic studies.

tools.name: hybracter
tools.one_line_profile: Automated long-read first bacterial genome assembly tool
tools.detailed_description: Hybracter is a Snakemake pipeline for bacterial genome assembly that prioritizes long reads, automating the process from reads to assembly.

tools.name: BugBuster
tools.one_line_profile: General metagenomics Nextflow pipeline
tools.detailed_description: BugBuster is a Nextflow-based pipeline designed for general metagenomic data processing and analysis.

tools.name: ARGprofiler
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for large-scale analysis of antimicrobial resistance genes
tools.detailed_description: ARGprofiler analyzes antimicrobial resistance genes (ARGs) and their flanking regions in large metagenomic datasets to study resistance mechanisms and context.

tools.name: Binette
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and accurate binning refinement tool
tools.detailed_description: Binette constructs high-quality MAGs by refining and integrating the output of multiple binning tools, aiming to improve bin quality and reduce contamination.

tools.name: DeepPolisher
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer-based sequence correction method for genome assembly polishing
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool that uses a Transformer architecture to correct errors in genome assemblies, specifically designed to improve the quality of long-read assemblies.

tools.name: d'accord
tools.one_line_profile: Non-hybrid long read consensus program based on local de Bruijn graph assembly
tools.detailed_description: A tool for error correction and consensus generation of long sequencing reads (e.g., PacBio, Nanopore) using local de Bruijn graphs to improve assembly accuracy.

tools.name: MetaVelvet
tools.one_line_profile: Extension of Velvet assembler for de novo metagenome assembly
tools.detailed_description: A de novo metagenomic assembler that extends the Velvet assembler to handle the complexity of mixed microbial communities by decomposing the de Bruijn graph into sub-graphs.

tools.name: BlockPolish
tools.one_line_profile: Accurate polishing of long-read assembly via block divide-and-conquer
tools.detailed_description: A polishing tool for long-read genome assemblies that employs a block divide-and-conquer strategy to improve accuracy and computational efficiency.

tools.name: MAGScoT
tools.one_line_profile: MAG scoring and refinement tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to score and refine Metagenome-Assembled Genomes (MAGs) by identifying and removing contamination and selecting the best bins from multiple binning results.

tools.name: HAPO-G
tools.one_line_profile: Haplotype-aware Polishing of Genomes
tools.detailed_description: A tool for polishing genome assemblies using accurate short reads, capable of handling phased assemblies and improving consensus quality.

tools.name: Racon (Legacy)
tools.one_line_profile: Ultrafast consensus module for raw de novo genome assembly
tools.detailed_description: A consensus module for raw de novo genome assembly of long uncorrected reads. (Note: This is the legacy repository, active development moved to lbcb-sci/racon).

tools.name: BIgMAG
tools.one_line_profile: Board InteGrating Metagenome-Assembled Genomes
tools.detailed_description: A workflow or tool designed to integrate and manage Metagenome-Assembled Genomes (MAGs), likely facilitating their analysis and visualization.

tools.name: VirFinder
tools.one_line_profile: K-mer based tool for identifying viral sequences from assembled metagenomic data
tools.detailed_description: A software tool that identifies viral sequences in metagenomic data using a k-mer based machine learning approach, helping to detect novel viruses.

tools.name: FMAP
tools.one_line_profile: Functional Mapping and Analysis Pipeline for metagenomics
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for the functional mapping and analysis of metagenomics and metatranscriptomics data, facilitating the understanding of microbial community functions.

tools.name: SqueezeMeta
tools.one_line_profile: A complete pipeline for metagenomic analysis
tools.detailed_description: A fully automated pipeline for metagenomics/metatranscriptomics, covering assembly, binning, taxonomic classification, and functional annotation.

tools.name: SGA
tools.one_line_profile: String Graph Assembler for de novo sequence assembly
tools.detailed_description: A de novo genome assembler based on the string graph concept, designed to be memory efficient and suitable for assembling large genomes from short reads.

tools.name: MetaFinisherSC
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to upgrade metagenomics assemblies using long reads
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to improve existing metagenomic assemblies by using long reads to fix mis-assemblies, perform scaffolding, and fill gaps.

tools.name: HyLight
tools.one_line_profile: Strain aware de novo assembly method using NGS and 3rd gen sequencing
tools.detailed_description: A hybrid assembler that combines short NGS reads and long third-generation sequencing reads to assemble complex metagenomes at strain resolution.

tools.name: StrainXpress
tools.one_line_profile: Strain aware de novo assembly method for metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: A de novo assembly tool based on the overlap-layout-consensus (OLC) paradigm, optimized for reconstructing strains from complex metagenomic data.

tools.name: genome-bin-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive tools for metagenome visualization and binning in R
tools.detailed_description: A set of R functions and tools for visualizing metagenomic contigs and refining genome bins interactively.

tools.name: HyPo
tools.one_line_profile: Super Fast & Accurate Polisher for Long Read Genome Assemblies
tools.detailed_description: A hybrid polisher that utilizes both short and long reads to correct errors in long-read genome assemblies with high speed and accuracy.

tools.name: QuantMeta
tools.one_line_profile: Determines absolute abundance of targets in metagenomes spiked with synthetic DNA
tools.detailed_description: A tool for absolute quantification of targets in metagenomic samples using synthetic DNA standards, including error correction for read mapping.

tools.name: GNNome
tools.one_line_profile: Graph neural networks to untangle assembly graphs
tools.detailed_description: A framework utilizing Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) to resolve ambiguities in assembly graphs produced by OLC-based assemblers, improving assembly continuity.

tools.name: MADRe
tools.one_line_profile: Strain-level metagenomic classification with Metagenome Assembly driven Database Reduction
tools.detailed_description: A tool for strain-level classification of metagenomic data that uses a database reduction approach driven by metagenome assembly to improve efficiency.

tools.name: Racon
tools.one_line_profile: Ultrafast consensus module for raw de novo genome assembly
tools.detailed_description: A highly efficient consensus module for correcting raw de novo genome assemblies of long uncorrected reads, widely used in long-read assembly pipelines.

tools.name: Raven
tools.one_line_profile: De novo genome assembler for long uncorrected reads
tools.detailed_description: A de novo genome assembler specifically designed for long uncorrected reads (PacBio/Nanopore), known for its speed and low memory usage.

tools.name: DeepMAsED
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning for Metagenome Assembly Error Detection
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool designed to identify mis-assemblies in metagenomic contigs, helping to improve the quality of metagenome-assembled genomes.

tools.name: Struo
tools.one_line_profile: Ley Lab MetaGenome Profiler DataBase generator
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline to construct custom databases of genomes (e.g., from GTDB) for use with metagenomic profilers, facilitating reproducible database generation.

tools.name: Struo2
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable creating/updating of metagenome profiling databases
tools.detailed_description: Struo2 is a pipeline designed for the scalable creation and updating of metagenome profiling databases, facilitating the management of reference data for metagenomic analysis.

tools.name: fermi
tools.one_line_profile: A WGS de novo assembler based on the FMD-index for large genomes
tools.detailed_description: Fermi is a de novo assembler for whole-genome sequencing data, utilizing the FMD-index to handle large genomes efficiently.

tools.name: miniasm
tools.one_line_profile: Ultrafast de novo assembly for long noisy reads
tools.detailed_description: Miniasm is an ultrafast de novo assembler for long noisy reads (e.g., PacBio or Nanopore) that performs assembly without a consensus step, outputting an assembly graph.

tools.name: cobra
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to improve viral genome assembly from metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: COBRA (Contig Overlap Based Re-Assembly) improves the quality of viral genomes assembled from short-read metagenomes by resolving and joining fragmented contigs.

tools.name: pyScaf
tools.one_line_profile: Genome assembly scaffolding tool
tools.detailed_description: pyScaf performs genome assembly scaffolding using information from paired-end/mate-pair libraries, long reads, and synteny to closely related species.

tools.name: SAGE2
tools.one_line_profile: De novo genome assembler
tools.detailed_description: SAGE2 is a de novo genome assembler designed to correct errors in sequencing data and produce high-quality assemblies.

tools.name: Magic3D
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for 3D scanning, reconstruction, and modeling
tools.detailed_description: Magic3D is a platform for developing graphics and vision technology, supporting tasks such as 3D scanning, reconstruction, modeling, and image processing.

tools.name: MetaCompass
tools.one_line_profile: Reference-guided Assembly of Metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: MetaCompass is a tool for the reference-guided assembly of metagenomes, leveraging known reference genomes to improve assembly quality.

tools.name: MetagenomeScope
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for (meta)genome assembly graphs
tools.detailed_description: MetagenomeScope is a visualization tool designed for exploring and analyzing metagenome assembly graphs.

tools.name: SALSA
tools.one_line_profile: Scaffold long read assemblies with Hi-C data
tools.detailed_description: SALSA is a tool that uses Hi-C data to scaffold long-read genome assemblies, improving contiguity and correcting misassemblies.

tools.name: metAMOS
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenomic assembly and analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: metAMOS is a modular pipeline for metagenomic assembly, analysis, and validation, integrating various tools for a comprehensive workflow.

tools.name: verkko
tools.one_line_profile: Telomere-to-telomere assembly of accurate long reads
tools.detailed_description: Verkko is a hybrid assembler designed for telomere-to-telomere assembly using accurate long reads (PacBio HiFi) and ultra-long reads (Oxford Nanopore).

tools.name: PhyloMagnet
tools.one_line_profile: Screening metagenomes for lineages using gene-centric assembly
tools.detailed_description: PhyloMagnet is a workflow for screening metagenomes for specific lineages using gene-centric assembly methods and phylogenetics.

tools.name: metapop
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for macro- and micro-diversity analyses of metagenomic populations
tools.detailed_description: Metapop is a pipeline for analyzing and visualizing the macro- and micro-diversity of populations derived from metagenomic data.

tools.name: MeSS
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for simulating shotgun metagenomic samples
tools.detailed_description: MeSS (Metagenomic Simulation System) is a Snakemake pipeline for simulating shotgun metagenomic samples to benchmark bioinformatic tools.

tools.name: ATLAS
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenome assembly, binning, and annotation pipeline
tools.detailed_description: ATLAS is a comprehensive workflow for metagenome data analysis, covering quality control, assembly, binning, and annotation.

tools.name: GraphBin
tools.one_line_profile: Refined binning of metagenomic contigs using assembly graphs
tools.detailed_description: GraphBin refines the binning of metagenomic contigs by utilizing the connectivity information from assembly graphs.

tools.name: GraphBin2
tools.one_line_profile: Refined and Overlapped Binning of Metagenomic Contigs
tools.detailed_description: GraphBin2 extends GraphBin to support refined and overlapped binning of metagenomic contigs using assembly graphs.

tools.name: MetaCoAG
tools.one_line_profile: Binning Metagenomic Contigs via Composition, Coverage and Assembly Graphs
tools.detailed_description: MetaCoAG is a tool for binning metagenomic contigs that integrates composition, coverage, and assembly graph information.

tools.name: metaSNV
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenomic SNV calling pipeline
tools.detailed_description: MetaSNV is a pipeline designed for calling Single Nucleotide Variants (SNVs) in metagenomic data.

tools.name: metaMAGs
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for metagenome assembled genomes generation
tools.detailed_description: metaMAGs is a workflow developed by the National Microbiome Data Collaborative (NMDC) for generating Metagenome Assembled Genomes (MAGs).

tools.name: CoFlyers
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for Collective Flying of Swarm Drones
tools.detailed_description: CoFlyers is a general platform for the simulation and control of collective flying swarm drones, supporting research in robotics and control systems.

tools.name: Flye
tools.one_line_profile: De novo assembler for single molecule sequencing reads
tools.detailed_description: Flye is a de novo assembler for single-molecule sequencing reads (PacBio, Nanopore) using repeat graphs to handle long, noisy reads.

tools.name: CONSENT
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable long read self-correction and assembly polishing
tools.detailed_description: CONSENT is a tool for the self-correction of long reads and polishing of assemblies using multiple sequence alignment.

tools.name: mOTUlizer
tools.one_line_profile: Utility to analyse a group of closely related MAGs/Genomes
tools.detailed_description: mOTUlizer is a utility for analyzing groups of closely related MAGs or genomes, helping to assess their quality and relationships.

tools.name: MAGpy
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for annotating metagenome-assembled genomes
tools.detailed_description: MAGpy is a Snakemake pipeline designed for the annotation of Metagenome-Assembled Genomes (MAGs).

tools.name: deepmetabin
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-based Gaussian Mixture VAE for metagenome binning
tools.detailed_description: DeepMetaBin is a metagenome binning tool that uses a graph-based Gaussian Mixture Variational Autoencoder to improve binning for short contigs.

tools.name: GraphUnzip
tools.one_line_profile: Unzip assembly graphs with Hi-C data and/or long reads
tools.detailed_description: GraphUnzip is a tool for 'unzipping' assembly graphs to resolve complex regions using Hi-C data or long reads.

tools.name: PandExo
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for Transiting Exoplanet Science with JWST & HST
tools.detailed_description: PandExo is a community tool for planning and simulating transiting exoplanet observations with the James Webb Space Telescope (JWST) and Hubble Space Telescope (HST).

tools.name: PathogenTrack
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline to identify pathogenic microorganisms from scRNA-seq raw data
tools.detailed_description: PathogenTrack is a pipeline designed to identify and characterize pathogenic microorganisms directly from single-cell RNA sequencing (scRNA-seq) raw data.

tools.name: nf-core/ampliseq
tools.one_line_profile: Amplicon sequencing analysis workflow using DADA2 and QIIME2
tools.detailed_description: nf-core/ampliseq is a Nextflow pipeline for the analysis of amplicon sequencing data, utilizing tools like DADA2 and QIIME2 for taxonomic classification.

tools.name: nf-core/createtaxdb
tools.one_line_profile: Automated construction of metagenomic classifier databases
tools.detailed_description: nf-core/createtaxdb is a pipeline for the parallelized and automated construction of databases for various metagenomic classifiers.

tools.name: nf-core/detaxizer
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline to remove specific sequences from raw genomic data
tools.detailed_description: nf-core/detaxizer is a pipeline designed to identify and optionally remove specific taxon sequences (e.g., human host) from raw genomic data.

tools.name: nf-core/eager
tools.one_line_profile: Ancient DNA analysis pipeline
tools.detailed_description: nf-core/eager is a reproducible pipeline for the analysis of ancient DNA (aDNA) data, covering quality control, mapping, and damage analysis.

tools.name: nf-core/funcscan
tools.one_line_profile: Screening for functional and natural product gene sequences
tools.detailed_description: nf-core/funcscan is a pipeline for screening (meta)genomic data for functional genes and natural product biosynthetic gene clusters.

tools.name: nf-core/genomeassembler
tools.one_line_profile: Assembly and scaffolding of haploid / unphased genomes
tools.detailed_description: nf-core/genomeassembler is a pipeline for the assembly and scaffolding of haploid or unphased genomes using long reads (ONT or PacBio HiFi).

tools.name: nf-core/mag
tools.one_line_profile: Assembly and binning of metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: nf-core/mag is a comprehensive pipeline for the assembly, binning, and refinement of metagenomes to generate Metagenome Assembled Genomes (MAGs).

tools.name: nf-core/metatdenovo
tools.one_line_profile: Assembly and annotation of metatranscriptomic or metagenomic data
tools.detailed_description: nf-core/metatdenovo is a pipeline for the de novo assembly and annotation of metatranscriptomic or metagenomic data, supporting prokaryotic, eukaryotic, and viral analysis.

tools.name: nf-core/proteinfamilies
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for generation and updating of protein families
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for generating and updating protein families, likely for comparative genomics or functional annotation purposes.

tools.name: nf-core/taxprofiler
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-taxonomic profiling pipeline for metagenomic data
tools.detailed_description: A highly parallelised Nextflow pipeline for multi-taxonomic profiling of shotgun short- and long-read metagenomic data, integrating multiple profiling tools.

tools.name: nf-core/viralmetagenome
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for viral genome reconstruction from metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for untargeted whole genome reconstruction with iSNV detection from metagenomic samples, specifically designed for viral analysis.

tools.name: nf-core/viralrecon
tools.one_line_profile: Assembly and variant calling pipeline for viral samples
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics analysis pipeline for assembly and intrahost/low-frequency variant calling for viral samples (e.g., SARS-CoV-2).

tools.name: DeepBin
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenome binning tool using transformers
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based tool for metagenomic binning that utilizes transformer architectures to improve the separation of contigs into genome bins.

tools.name: GRiD
tools.one_line_profile: Bacterial growth rate measurement from genomes and metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: Growth Rate Index (GRiD) measures bacterial growth rate from reference genomes and metagenomic bins at ultra-low sequencing coverage.

tools.name: metagenome_assembly_pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for metagenome assembly and binning
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline to process raw sequencing data into high quality bins and generate visualizations, developed by Parfrey Lab.

tools.name: Phasebook
tools.one_line_profile: Haplotype-aware de novo assembly of diploid genomes
tools.detailed_description: A tool for haplotype-aware de novo assembly of diploid genomes using long reads, capable of handling high heterozygosity.

tools.name: FALCON-Phase
tools.one_line_profile: Phasing tool for PacBio assemblies using Hi-C data
tools.detailed_description: Integrates PacBio long-read assemblies with Phase Genomics Hi-C data to create phased, diploid, chromosome-scale scaffolds.

tools.name: Lightguide
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for distributed acoustic sensing (DAS) data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library and toolset for processing distributed acoustic sensing (DAS) data, used in geophysics and seismology.

tools.name: BinaRena
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive visualization and binning of metagenomic contigs
tools.detailed_description: A web-based tool for interactive visualization and manual refinement of metagenomic bins, allowing users to inspect and modify contig clustering.

tools.name: Aviary
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid assembly and MAG recovery pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A metagenomics pipeline for hybrid assembly and Metagenome-Assembled Genome (MAG) recovery, integrating multiple assembly and binning tools.

tools.name: MetaPlatanus
tools.one_line_profile: De novo metagenome assembler
tools.detailed_description: A de novo assembler designed specifically for metagenomic data, capable of handling uneven coverage and complex graph structures.

tools.name: Platanus_B
tools.one_line_profile: De novo genome assembler for bacterial genomes
tools.detailed_description: A de novo genome assembler optimized for bacterial genomes, handling various sequencing artifacts and repeat structures.

tools.name: Autocycler
tools.one_line_profile: Consensus long-read assembly generator for bacteria
tools.detailed_description: A tool that generates consensus long-read assemblies for bacterial genomes by running multiple assemblies and merging them to produce a high-quality circularized genome.

tools.name: Polypolish
tools.one_line_profile: Short-read polishing tool for long-read assemblies
tools.detailed_description: A tool for polishing long-read assemblies with short reads, fixing errors in homopolymers and other regions where long reads may be error-prone.

tools.name: Rebaler
tools.one_line_profile: Reference-based long read assembly for bacteria
tools.detailed_description: A tool for performing reference-based assemblies of bacterial genomes using long reads, useful when a close reference is available.

tools.name: Trycycler
tools.one_line_profile: Consensus long-read assembly tool for bacterial genomes
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating consensus long-read assemblies for bacterial genomes, taking multiple assembly inputs to produce a robust final assembly.

tools.name: Smartdenovo
tools.one_line_profile: Ultra-fast de novo assembler for long noisy reads
tools.detailed_description: A de novo assembler designed for long noisy reads (PacBio/ONT), emphasizing speed and efficiency without requiring error correction steps.

tools.name: wtdbg
tools.one_line_profile: Fuzzy Bruijn graph assembler for long noisy reads
tools.detailed_description: An assembler using a fuzzy Bruijn graph approach to efficiently assemble long noisy reads from PacBio or Nanopore sequencing.

tools.name: wtdbg2
tools.one_line_profile: Redbean: Fast long-read assembler using fuzzy Bruijn graphs
tools.detailed_description: The successor to wtdbg, also known as Redbean. A very fast de novo assembler for long noisy reads using fuzzy Bruijn graphs.

tools.name: Rala
tools.one_line_profile: Layout module for raw de novo genome assembly
tools.detailed_description: A standalone layout module for raw de novo genome assembly of long uncorrected reads, often used as a component in assembly pipelines.

tools.name: IVA
tools.one_line_profile: De novo virus assembler for Illumina reads
tools.detailed_description: Iterative Virus Assembler (IVA) is designed to assemble virus genomes from mixed populations using Illumina paired-end reads.

tools.name: sanger-tol/metagenomeassembly
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for metagenome assembly and binning (PacBio/Hi-C)
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for the assembly and binning of metagenomes from PacBio HiFi and Illumina Hi-C sequencing data, developed by Sanger Tree of Life.

tools.name: sanger-tol/readmapping
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline to align short and long reads to genome assembly
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline to align short and long reads to a reference genome assembly, part of the Tree of Life production suite.

tools.name: Gapless
tools.one_line_profile: Scaffolding and gap-closing tool for long reads
tools.detailed_description: Gapless provides combined scaffolding, gap-closing, and assembly correction using long reads to improve genome assembly continuity.

tools.name: GameteBinning_tetraploid
tools.one_line_profile: Haplotype-resolved assembly of tetraploid genomes
tools.detailed_description: A tool for haplotype-resolved assembly of tetraploid genomes using gamete sequencing data to separate haplotypes.

tools.name: MetaViC
tools.one_line_profile: Virus metagenomic pipeline for unknown hosts
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for viral metagenomics designed to detect viruses in samples with unknown hosts or in the absence of a host genome.

tools.name: centroFlye
tools.one_line_profile: Centromere assembly algorithm using long reads
tools.detailed_description: An algorithm specifically designed for the assembly of centromeres using long error-prone reads, addressing highly repetitive genomic regions.

tools.name: Mabs
tools.one_line_profile: Optimizer for Hifiasm and Flye genome assembly parameters
tools.detailed_description: Mabs is a genome assembly tool designed to optimize the parameters of existing assemblers like Hifiasm and Flye, aiming to improve assembly quality.

tools.name: PlasFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Plasmid sequence prediction in metagenomic assemblies
tools.detailed_description: PlasFlow is a set of scripts used for the prediction of plasmid sequences in metagenomic contigs using neural networks.

tools.name: MAGpurify
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for cleaning and improving metagenome-assembled genomes
tools.detailed_description: MAGpurify is a tool for detecting and removing contamination from metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs) to improve their quality.

tools.name: MIDAS
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for estimating strain-level genomic variation
tools.detailed_description: MIDAS (Metagenomic Intra-Species Diversity Analysis System) is an integrated pipeline for estimating strain-level genomic variation from metagenomic data.

tools.name: Binning_refiner
tools.one_line_profile: Refinement tool for metagenomic bins
tools.detailed_description: Binning_refiner improves genome bins by combining the outputs of different binning programs to reduce contamination and increase completeness.

tools.name: MetaCHIP
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for horizontal gene transfer identification
tools.detailed_description: MetaCHIP is a pipeline for identifying horizontal gene transfer (HGT) events in metagenomic data.

tools.name: SolidBin
tools.one_line_profile: Semi-supervised spectral clustering for metagenomic binning
tools.detailed_description: SolidBin is a metagenomic binning tool that utilizes semi-supervised spectral clustering to group contigs into bins.

tools.name: Sunbeam
tools.one_line_profile: Extensible pipeline for metagenomic sequencing analysis
tools.detailed_description: Sunbeam is a robust and extensible pipeline for analyzing metagenomic sequencing data, handling steps from quality control to assembly and annotation.

tools.name: ALGA
tools.one_line_profile: Short read de novo genome assembler
tools.detailed_description: ALGA is a tool for de novo genome assembly from short sequencing reads.

tools.name: TetramerFreqs Binning Scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for calculating tetramer frequencies for ESOM binning
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts to calculate tetramer frequencies and prepare input files for ESOM-based metagenomic binning.

tools.name: Seq2MAG
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow from sequencing data to MAGs
tools.detailed_description: Seq2MAG is a metagenomics workflow designed to process raw sequencing data and produce Metagenome-Assembled Genomes (MAGs).

tools.name: iMGMC
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated mouse gut metagenomic catalog repository
tools.detailed_description: Repository containing resources and scripts related to the integrated mouse gut metagenomic catalog (iMGMC).

tools.name: Berokka
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to trim, circularise and orient long read bacterial assemblies
tools.detailed_description: Berokka is a tool for post-processing long-read bacterial genome assemblies, performing trimming, circularization, and orientation.

tools.name: Mokka
tools.one_line_profile: Annotation tool for metagenome assemblies
tools.detailed_description: Mokka is a tool designed to annotate metagenome assemblies, likely identifying genes and functional elements.

tools.name: LOMA
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for nanopore metagenomic classification and assembly
tools.detailed_description: LOMA is a Nextflow pipeline designed to classify, align, and assemble nanopore metagenomic reads.

tools.name: Metaphor
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for assembly and binning of metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: Metaphor is a general-purpose workflow designed to automate the assembly and binning processes for metagenomic data.

tools.name: TracesPipe
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for viral and host genome reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: TracesPipe is a pipeline for the reconstruction and analysis of viral and host genomes from metagenomic data at a multi-organ level.

tools.name: MEGAHIT
tools.one_line_profile: Ultra-fast and memory-efficient metagenome assembler
tools.detailed_description: MEGAHIT is a highly efficient de novo assembler for large and complex metagenomics data, known for its speed and low memory consumption.

tools.name: HASLR
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid genome assembly tool for long and short reads
tools.detailed_description: HASLR is a fast tool for hybrid genome assembly that combines long reads (e.g., Nanopore/PacBio) and short reads (Illumina).

tools.name: Metagenomic-Analysis-Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for metagenomic sequence data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed for the analysis of metagenomic sequence data, facilitating various processing steps.

tools.name: OM-HiC-scaffolding
tools.one_line_profile: Scaffolding long-read assemblies using optical mapping and Hi-C
tools.detailed_description: Workflows for correcting and scaffolding long-read genome assemblies using optical mapping and/or Dovetail Hi-C data.

tools.name: Galah
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable dereplication tool for metagenome assembled genomes
tools.detailed_description: Galah is a tool for dereplicating metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs) based on Average Nucleotide Identity (ANI), designed for scalability.

tools.name: RAGA
tools.one_line_profile: Reference-guided alternative long read generator
tools.detailed_description: RAGA generates alternative long reads with the help of target assemblies, PacBio HiFi reads, and a reference genome.

tools.name: ARGs-OAP
tools.one_line_profile: Online analysis pipeline for antibiotic resistance genes detection
tools.detailed_description: ARGs-OAP is a pipeline for the detection and quantification of antibiotic resistance genes (ARGs) from metagenomic data using a structured database.

tools.name: DiTing
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline to infer biogeochemical pathways in metagenomic data
tools.detailed_description: DiTing is a pipeline designed to infer and compare biogeochemical pathways from metagenomic sequencing data.

tools.name: UnitigBIN
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenomic contig binning using unitig-level assembly graphs
tools.detailed_description: UnitigBIN is a tool for metagenomic binning that encodes unitig-level assembly graphs with heterophilous constraints to improve binning accuracy.

tools.name: EnsembleAssembler
tools.one_line_profile: De novo assembly of pathogen genomes from metagenomic samples
tools.detailed_description: EnsembleAssembler performs de novo assembly of pathogen genomes from metagenomic samples sequenced using Illumina platforms.

tools.name: PPA-Assembler
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for de novo genome assembly based on Pregel
tools.detailed_description: PPA-Assembler is a toolkit for parallel de novo genome assembly implemented using the Pregel framework for distributed graph processing.

tools.name: DBG2OLC
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient hybrid genome assembler for long erroneous reads and short accurate reads
tools.detailed_description: DBG2OLC is a genome assembly tool designed to assemble large genomes using long error-prone reads (e.g., PacBio, Nanopore) and short accurate reads (Illumina). It significantly reduces computational time and cost by using a De Bruijn Graph-based approach for initial contig formation followed by an Overlap-Layout-Consensus step.

tools.name: COCACOLA
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenomic binning framework integrating multiple genomic signatures
tools.detailed_description: COCACOLA is a binning tool for metagenomic contigs that improves clustering accuracy by simultaneously incorporating read coverage, sequence composition, and paired-end read linkage information, along with a co-alignment correlation strategy.
